description.title: GNU Database System
description.paragraph: The GNU Database System is a set of database routines that use extensible hashing. It works similarly to the standard UNIX dbm routines, and provides compatibility replacement interfaces for the traditional 'dbm' and 'ndbm' libraries.

The msys-gdbm package provides the command-line utilities for saving and restoring GDBM databases, other tools for testing the various compatibility interfaces, and related documentation. The associated msys-libgdbm package provides the runtime library and related development files.
